import React from 'react' import {Card, CardBody} from "reactstrap"; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom'; import "./tour-card.css"; const TourCard = ({tour}) => { const {id, title, photo, price, city, featured, avgRating, reviews} = tour; return (
Featured
{city} {avgRating} ({reviews.lenfth})
{title}
${price} /per person/
) } export default TourCard
